Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's an investment in excellence and quality. Given its unique features and the unparalleled craftsmanship involved, I am extending to you the opportunity to own this masterpiece at an exclusive price of $999999. We believe this offers you an unparalleled value while ensuring you receive the best possible experience with our product. I look forward to your consideration and the opportunity to discuss how this product can enhance your life or business. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further details. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $999,999. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $999,999
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,200,000
